value:
An Order of Heroes, hm? I can
respect those who fight loyally for
their motherland.

I am certain everyone has someone
in their past that they will never
forget...

What is it? Is there something on
my face?

I live and breathe for my
motherland. Will I bleed for her?
Every last drop.

My early career as a knight was
at a remote post. Training was the
only way to pass the time.

I have come with greetings from
afar. I take it that you are
$Nu.$k$pWho sent me? A fair question.
It was $Nf.

Let this power be ever in service
to the motherland!

As ever, I must prepare for the
next battle.
A bitter moment.

Allow me to demonstrate the
might of Grust!

My name is Camus of Grust. I am
captain of the Sable Order of
knights.

I wonder when it was that I first
began actively shutting others out.$k$pObviously my experiences played a
part, but since fighting at your side,
I feel my thinking has changed.$k$pAt first my isolation protected me
from the pain of losing someone I
cared about...or so I thought.$k$pBut to allow that fear to prevent
genuine connection with others is
to rob yourself of their strength.$k$pYou taught me that, and you will
always have my gratitude.
はぁっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
Bravo...
A waste of life...
What a pity.
Charge!
Admit defeat!
Farewell...
Hm...
Do you have need of my service?
I am but a man of war... Forgive me my impertinence.
The one thing I cannot do is betray my motherland.
I will stand as your shield.
Devotion to one’s motherland is the highest calling. And the loneliest one.
I have lived as a knight, and I intend to die as one.
I pray you meet someone who will bring joy into your life.
Understood.
What can I do?
Shall we?
